main: ^Hi, I'm sorry I'm just cleaning here. Have I hindered you??
^I need an entry code to rafinery.
^How did you get that gemstone in your bag and can you give it to me?
^No. Sorry, didn't mean to disturb you.
cleaning: ^I'm just a cleaner, I don't know anything about that.
gem: ^Oh, I found it on the ground near the entrance to the museum. If you want it I can give it to you but can you maybe help me a little?
^I don't have time for that right now.
tax: ^Oh thanks. Okay listen. I never wanted to be a cleaner here, I want to be a musician, but some lady there told me a few months ago that I commited some kind of tax fraud and I need to do social work now. You look clever, I didn't commit any fraud, maybe you can clarify my situation?
^I will see what I can do.
